name: mannering-woocommerce-child
description: Hi. I'm a starter theme called mannering_music, or underscores, if you like. I'm a theme meant for hacking so don't use me as a Parent Theme. Instead try turning me into the next, most awesome, WordPress theme out there. That's what I'm here for.
author: Automattic Theme Team

scripts.bundle: dir-archiver --src . --dest ../mannering-woocommerce-theme.zip --exclude .DS_Store .vscode .editorconfig .prettierrc .stylelintrc .eslintrc .git .gitattributes .github .gitignore README.md composer.json composer.lock node_modules vendor package-lock.json package.json phpcs.xml.dist postcss.config.js sass style.css.map woocommerce.css.map
